segments.text: Good morning . Please come into my office .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see that you have some impressive writing experience .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I have written for several top newspapers in the country . I'm also in the process of writing my first novel .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wonderful . I'd like to know why you're interested in this position at our paper .
segments.speaker: S1
